| History                 = Presumably, Blackwater has a similar history and backgrounds to its [[Wikipedia:Academi|Earth-1218 counterpart]].

Blackwater was active along the [[United States Armed Forces (Earth-616)|US military]] during the [[War in Afghanistan|War]] in [[Afghanistan]]. Some of their operatives crossed paths with [[United States Army (Earth-616)|United States Army]] ranger [[Nicholas Fury, Jr. (Earth-616)|Sergeant Marcus Johnson]].{{r|Battle Scars #1}}

| Notes                   = * '''Blackwater''' is a real-life private military company founded in 1997, that renamed itself '''Xe Services''' in 2009, and known as '''[[Wikipedia:Academi|Academi]]''' since 2011.
* [[Blackguard (Earth-616)|Blackguard]], a private military company and subsidary of [[Roxxon Energy Corporation (Earth-616)|Roxxon]] first appearing in {{cl|Wolverine Weapon X #1}} (June, 2009), is possibly based on the Blackwater.
